article_title: Dear IRS, I'm Moving To Mali Where You Pick Your Own Tax Rate. Let's See, 3% Or 30%?

article_metadata.description: If you're fed up with taxes, consider moving to Mali. You can pick your own tax rate.
article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood
